text: Hey guys, What is the best practice for building a mega menu in HubSpot CMS
We used to try to hack the native menu but it gets pretty unwieldy. Your best bet IMO is just using a global module with centrally controlled values.

Hello!

Thanks, we'll look into it!

Actually, we'd like to export these data via automated solution: <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/account/export-account-activity-history>

Hey! has anyone figured out the custom code for the weighted lead rotation in a workflow? i tried to follow a demo but it didn't get me anywhere :joy:
Any help would be much appreciated.

I would also recommend using the `menu()` function in the global module in the menu to get better granular control on the menu markup.
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/tags#menu>

Hey Tom, what error are you getting? The things I would check, without seeing the error logs in the workflow history tab, are:
• You’ve added your `HAPIKEY` as a secret to the custom code action (with that capitalization, since the secret names are case sensitive)
• The owner IDs in the code have been updated to valid owner IDs in your account, following the instructions in the code comment
i have done both of the above, but do i have to create a custom output variable for the simple branch to come off of?

hi there!

does anyone know why I am unable to link a form from HubSpot to clickfunnels? When I embed the code it comes up blank where there should be a pop up of the sign up form?

I would really appreciate any help!
Not sure where the right place to ask this is, but how do I request access to a beta? Specifically the Custom Quotes Templates
Yeah, you’ll want to have an `enumeration` output called `owner_id`, and then you can use the “copy property” action to copy that value onto the enrolled contact
ahhh, that could be where im going wrong! Let me try!
